20110117140647.000|20110117140648.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WELL, GOOD         
20110117140648.000|20110117140649.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110117140649.000|20110117140650.000|CC1|THIS HAPPENED AT 5:00 YESTERDAY 
20110117140650.000|20110117140652.000|CC1|AFTERNOON AT GARDEN GROVE, AT A 
20110117140652.000|20110117140653.000|CC1|SHOPPING CENTER.                
20110117140653.000|20110117140655.000|CC1|POLICE WERE CALLED TO AN ARMED  
20110117140655.000|20110117140655.000|CC1|ROBBERY COMPLAINT.              
20110117140655.000|20110117140658.000|CC1|WHEN THEY GOT THERE THEY SAY AT 
20110117140658.000|20110117140701.000|CC1|LEAST TWO SUSPECTS STARTED      
20110117140701.000|20110117140702.000|CC1|RUNNING IN OPPOSITE DIRECTIONS

20110117140704.000|20110117140705.000|CC1|WESTMINSTER.

20110117140706.000|20110117140709.000|CC1|STATION, A CAR HIT HIM AS HE

20110117140713.000|20110117140715.000|CC1|THAT'S WHEN THE SHOOTING        
20110117140715.000|20110117140715.000|CC1|OCCURRED.
